name: The Manhattan Project - Digital Edition
blurb: A digital version of the popular Euro-style board game The Manhattan Project for iPad, PC & Android

rewards.reward: No Reward
Thanks! Like all reward tiers you can OVER PLEDGE $ to this level to get items off the ADD-ON MENU (below game play video). Add-On items will be mailed to you right after this campaign ends.

IPAD - USA only iOS version of the game. Just add $45 more (plus shipping) to get the cardboard version of the game mailed to you right after this campaign ends. Sorry, Apple does not allow us to send apps out of the US.  So this you must have an account on the USA iTunes app store.
PC - Windows version of the game. Just add $45 more (plus shipping) to get the cardboard version of the game mailed to you right after this campaign ends.
ANDROID - Android version of the game. Just add $45 more (plus shipping) to get the cardboard version of the game mailed to you right after this campaign ends.
WORLD IPAD - USA only iOS version of the game.  Your game will be gifted to you by a local supporter helping this campaign out.
DOUBLE BUNDLE - Get the Windows PC, and Android versions of the game. You may then play against each other on all devices.

USA DOUBLE BUNDLE - Get the iPad and Windows PC versions of the game. You may then play against each other on all devices. Sorry, Apple does not allow us to send apps out of the US. So this you must have an account on the USA iTunes app store.

WORLD DOUBLE BUNDLE - Get the iPad and Windows PC versions of the game. You may then play against each other on all devices. Your game will be gifted to you by a local supporter helping this campaign out.
PORTABLE DOUBLE - Get the iPad and Android versions of the game. You may then play against each other on all devices.
BETA - PC Version - Beta Access. Get an early copy and help test the game.
BETA - ANDROID Version - Beta Access. Get an early copy and help test the game.

USA TRIPLE BUNDLE - Get the iPad, Windows PC, and Android versions of the game. You may then play against each other on all devices. Sorry, Apple does not allow us to send apps out of the US. So this you must have an account on the USA iTunes app store.

WORLD TRIPLE BUNDLE - Get the iPad, Windows PC, and Android versions of the game. You may then play against each other on all devices. Your game will be gifted to you by a local supporter helping this campaign out.
USA BETA - IPAD Version - Beta Access. Get an early copy and help test the game. Sorry, Apple does not allow us to send apps out of the US. Requires a USA iTunes app store account.
CREDIT - PC Version - Your name in CREDITS in the game for your generous help. Plus Beta Access. Get an early copy and help test the game.
CREDIT - ANDROID Version - Your name in CREDITS in the game for your generous help. Plus Beta Access. Get an early copy and help test the game

CREDIT - IPAD Version - Your name in CREDITS in the game for your generous help. Plus Beta Access. Get an early copy and help test the game.  Sorry, Apple does not allow us to send apps out of the US. Requires a USA iTunes app store account.

USA ALPHA - IPAD Version - Alpha TESTER: get your hands on a very early copy of the game right after this campaign is successful. You get to help us work out the bugs and be a part of a private group forum! Your name will be in the CREDITS as a TESTER for the game for your generous help. Plus Beta Access.  Sorry, Apple does not allow us to send apps out of the US. Requires a USA iTunes app store account.

ALPHA - PC Version - Alpha TESTER: get your hands on a very early copy of the game right after this campaign is successful. You get to help us work out the bugs and be a part of a private group forum! Your name will be in the CREDITS as a TESTER for the game for your generous help. Plus Beta Access.

ALPHA - ANDROID Version - Alpha TESTER: get your hands on a very early copy of the game right after this campaign is successful. You get to help us work out the bugs and be a part of a private group forum! Your name will be in the CREDITS as a TESTER for the game for your generous help. Plus Beta Access.

PLAYER - iPad, PC, & Android version - Be a Player! We'll use a PORTRAIT icon designed by you (with help from our artists) as the picture/avatar for an AI player. You also get the Alpha & Beta Tester level and get be a part of a private group forum! Your name will be in the CREDITS for the game for your generous help.  Sorry, Apple does not allow us to send apps out of the US. Requires a USA iTunes app store account.

AI - iPad, PC, & Android version - Be a SMART Player AI! We will let you help design an AI with specialized play style to call your own. You define a set of AI priorities and heuristics. A likeness of you will be used to represent this player AI. You also get the Alpha & Beta Tester level and get be a part of a private group forum! Your name will be in the CREDITS for the game for your generous help. Sorry, Apple does not allow us to send apps out of the US. Requires a USA iTunes app store account.
